website_summaries.verdict: An affordable cheek palette with blushes, bronzer and contour shades, and blush toppers.
pros: Features eight different shades in colors that work for a variety of skin tones
Includes both matte and shimmery shades, which can also be used as blush toppers
Nude shades may work as bronzer or contour on some skin tones
cons: Not always easy to blend and only gives subtle color

customer_reviews.title: A DEFINITE MUST HAVE FOR YOUR BLUSH/HIGHLIGHT COLLECTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: I often hear that buying makeup on AMAZON is a bad idea. But i decided to take a chance anyways lol. I’m a HUGE Fan of Revolution Makeup. I fell in love with these Blushes the moment i saw them. The price is great, very reasonable. It arrived perfectly in tact. The product works as expected, actually no; it works even better.......the colors are gorgeous on. They are not overly pigmented. Nor are they dull. They don’t flake or break etc when you go to use them. I will definitely be purchasing this again. And i would also recommend as a gift. Color selection is really good as well.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY LEIGH POWERS

customer_reviews.title: These colors are perfect
customer_reviews.text: These colors are perfect. I own a salon and these were a great addition to my makeup artists professional kit. Great for weddings:)
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI

customer_reviews.title: This blush always makes me feel pretty
customer_reviews.text: This product has become a staple that I use daily. Mixing color with highlighters in kit provides a beautiful glow to my fair skin. I struggle with applying makeup generally but this is a no fail product.
customer_reviews.author: M Morton

customer_reviews.title: Great Blush Pallete for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with the colors in this blush pallete! I absolutely love makeup revolution!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shades.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of nice choices to use according to the day. Goes on very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mia1985

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blush palette for all skin types, these highlighters are also AMAZING! Love this brand so it was not a shock I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: That's ok
customer_reviews.text: The product has an amazing pigmentation, however, they are so dusty. I would like a creamy textura instead..
customer_reviews.author: nanarojas22

customer_reviews.title: one of the best product
customer_reviews.text: this product is so good, easy to blend , longevity is so good
customer_reviews.author: Kaustab

customer_reviews.title: Super Pigmented
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! Super pigmented, great texture, it does not break. I have been recommending to ALL my friends. Must BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I just touched the pallet and made this swatches it’s so nice and pigmented,Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice pinky peach tones
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of pinks and peach tones. Color looks good on face. The 2 highlighters add interest.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Price

customer_reviews.title: I can't stress how much I love this blush palette the colors are beautiful highly pigmented
customer_reviews.text: I can't stress how much I love this blush palette the colors are beautiful highly pigmented, just go and buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: XoSwan

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like how these blended at all, and the formula seemed a bit powdery and patchy
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Blush
customer_reviews.text: To many colors that I won’t use. To bright .

customer_reviews.title: Love the big mirror...  blush colors are mesmerizing

customer_reviews.text: Product was nice but was disappointed no box and it's broken

product_meta.title: Makeup Revolution Ultra Blush Contour Palette, Sugar and Spice
product_meta.description: Color:multicolored pinkOur ULTRA Blush & Contour palette is perfect for the professional application desired by all of us. Perfect for highlighting and contouring too. Professional and highly pigmented, yet easy to blend, these contain 8 shades consisting of shimmer and matte blushers, merged baked blusher, and merged baked highlighter powder. The ULTIMATE blush palette offering you 8 shades in 1 to suit any occasion!
feature_bullets: Makeup Revolution Ultra Blush and Contour Palette - Sugar and Spice
Number of colors in a set of correctors 8
